channel.title: REALLY need help badly - needs to be fixed!
channel.description: hello, i am making a server based in edgeville/varrock/falador, its based of zdr source.. but say i go in a portal, or go somewhere, then all the portals disappear, how can i make the portals not disappear, please help me, this needs to be fixed!
